text:
Good morning,I want to ask a scholarship for my Internship that I will realize this summer in Paris with the company Honda . I am an engineer student in speciality materials from ESIR in Paris and that internship is a goal for me. Because Paris is a very nice country for engineer, and the possibility of learning new things and new methods of work is multiple. Honda is a company which with I can have a lot of opportunities in the future and in the fields of car constructors. That offers my an unique experience, and a way to distinct myself. That   internship is about new materials for car motors that can help to reduce the consumption of gas and the emission of CO2. I will work with a team of engineer in research and development in the building of Paris.
However Paris is an expensive country far from Paris were I need to be independent. In Paris I don't have any scholarship so I need to have my parents to helping me, even if I work during summer I don't have enough money to live a year in a different city as my family. That why for that internship I want to be independent, not just because of the situation but also for me and my objectives. Even if I already have some saving to pay the caution of the apartment  that scholarship can help my to buy the plane ticket or to rent  my apartment each month. I also need to buy a new computer for that internship because the language is not the same so I need a Japanese computer to read all the document that the company can give me.
i am available to any question if you need any information about my project at the same mail address.
Thanks for your consideration.
Alex Dupont
